trans-unit.source: Defines an attribute that specifies the scope where a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider"></xref> object should be applied when a resource is located.
trans-unit.target: 범위를 지정 하는 특성을 정의 합니다. 여기서는 <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider"> </xref> 리소스가 발견 되는 경우 개체를 적용 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> class parses and generates code during compilation for a resource that has a specific file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider>클래스 구문 분석 하 고 특정 파일에 있는 리소스에 대 한 컴파일하는 동안 코드를 생성 합니다.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider>

trans-unit.source: The FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute attribute defines the location scope for which the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> object will be called.
trans-unit.target: FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute 특성 위치 범위를 정의 고 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider>개체 호출 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider>

trans-unit.source: By setting the FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute attribute, you can limit a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> object to certain [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] directories, such as App_Code.
trans-unit.target: FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute 특성을 설정 하 여 제한할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider>개체를 특정 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 등 App_Code 디렉터리.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider>

trans-unit.source: If you do not apply a FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute attribute to a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> class, by default, the attribute targets all directories.
trans-unit.target: FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute 특성을 적용 하지 않는 경우는 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider>클래스, 기본적으로 특성을 대상으로 모든 디렉터리.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute"></xref> class.
The target directory that a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider"></xref> object applies to.
Gets or sets the target directory that a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider"></xref> object applies to.
trans-unit.target: 대상 디렉터리를 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider"> </xref> 개체에 적용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The directory that a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider"></xref> object applies to.
